column4: i cant get more than one resolution after installing nvidia driver, what am i doing wrong?? here is my xorg.conf: http://pastehere.com/?onurnr
what other resolutions do you want?
i want 1600x1200 and under, but i have listed them all, and now im trying it with just one listed. but no matter what i do, i only get 800x600
did you tried by writing those modes in your xorg.conf ?   Modes   "1680x1050" "1280x1024" "1024x768" "800x600" "640x480"
